sentence.Network_en: Our people's liberation army is now in the cantonment.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的人民解决军现在正在宿营地.

sentence.Network_en: They are making our thousands of warriors of the PLA go hungry in the cantonment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们让数万人民解放军的战士们在营房里挨饿.

sentence.Network_en: We have kept our fighters in the cantonment for the last five months.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去5个月来,我们把我们的战士驻在营房里.

list.abs: 广东道(Canton Road) 是香港九龙油尖旺区一条主要的道路。这条街道其实是横跨三个区域：旺角、油麻地，以及尖沙咀。
...同期还举办三个独立而与其又相互紧扣的展会，分别是“纺织机械（CANTON TEX）、染料及纺织化学品展（CANTON DYE）”、纺 …
Canton cotton 广东棉绒布canton crane 轻便落地吊车Canton crepe 广绫
广州塔（canton tower）（Canton Tower），建于广州市海珠区阅江西路，距离珠江南岸125米，与海心沙岛及珠江新城隔江相望。是一座以观光旅游 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French cantonnement, from cantonner 'to quarter' (see canton)

entry.def: A cantonment is a group of buildings or a camp where soldiers live.

means.word_mean: 1. temporary living quarters specially built by the army for soldiers;

sentences.sentence: "wherever he went in the camp the men were grumbling"

auth_sentence.content: The building is in Peshawar's cantonment area close to the US consulate.
auth_sentence.res_content: The building is in Peshawar's cantonment area close to the US consulate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The building is in Peshawar's cantonment area close to the US consulate.

auth_sentence.content: "Basically, in our cantonment there is no any minors," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Basically, in our cantonment there is no any minors," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Basically, in our cantonment there is no any minors," he said.

auth_sentence.content: It wasn't very impressive-looking several cantonment style claptrap wooden buildings joined together by one long narrow hallway.
